author: ffang
msg: add my public key and test my first commit

author: timw
msg: Use the DLL handle to make the shared memory file name used by the ISAPI Redirector unique for each DLL - the redirector supports multiple instances per website, and without this multiple redirectors could access the same shared memory file, corrupting the contents (evident when LB workers are used on IIS 7).
